page.title: 11RELIGION IN SUTTON IN ASH.
page.content: {PLACES OF WORSHIP.Church of England 8 St.Mary Magdalene is the Parish Church,dating from the 1400s,altered and restored in the 1800s.St.Modwen, St.Michael,All Saints-Huthwaite, St.Andrew-Skegby,St.Mark-Fulwood, St.Katherine-Teversal,All-Saints- Stanton Hill.{Roman Catholic-} St.Joseph.{Baptist-}3.{Methodist-}6 {Pentecostal-}3.{United Reformed-}High Pavement.{Salvation Army-}Bowne St. {Contact for Christ-}High Pavement. Non-Christian Denominations-{Mormom {Church-}Carsic Estate.{National {Spiritualist Church-}The Twitchell. {Jehovah's Witnesses-}Mason St.{Seventh {Day Adventist-}Dalestorth St. In July 1984 most of the Christian Churches joined together to hold a week-long mission. Miss Bell's class,Forest Glade P.S.
